hibernate-mapping.query: SELECT user.Id, user.EmailStatus, profile.FirstName, profile.LastName, user.Email, user.RegistrationStatus, user.CreatedUtc, user.LastLoginUtc FROM Orchard.ContentManagement.Records.ContentItemVersionRecord version JOIN version.ContentItemRecord item JOIN item.ContentTypeRecord type JOIN item.UserPartRecord user JOIN item.UserProfilePart profile WHERE version.Published = true AND type.Name = 'User'
